name: Define Melanie
description:
Define Melanie is a visual novel about a girl who wakes up in an alley with no memories except for her name, Melanie, and soon realizes she has been turned into a cyborg. She tries her best to find out what has happened to her while wandering in a strange city.

This version contains only the first chapter of the game, so it's only a small sneak peek into Melanie's story, but I hope you enjoy it!

There is a chance of more chapters coming later, so feel free to follow me on Twitter for updates on that.

Define Melanie chapter 1 is playable for free on Windows, Mac and Linux.
